briefTitle: CyclASol for the Treatment of Signs and Symptoms of Dry Eye Disease (DED)
officialTitle: A Phase 2b/3, Multicenter, Randomized, Double-masked, Vehicle-controlled Clinical Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Topical CyclASolÂ® for the Treatment of Signs and Symptoms of Dry Eye Disease (DED) (ESSENCE Trial)
summary: The objective of this study is to assess the efficacy, safety, and tolerability of CyclASol Ophthalmic Solution in comparison to vehicle for the treatment of the signs and symptoms of DED.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Total Corneal Fluorescein Staining at Day 29
